metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37327 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Integer overflow leading to heap overwrite in FLAC image tag handling

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Two patches are required to fix this CVE. Main patch is in the "good" package, and second patch is in the "base" package.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-base0.10 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
gst-plugins-base1.0 package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
gst-plugins-good0.10 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
gst-plugins-good1.0 package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
